## DetailedFailure.isFailure() method

Reports that this [DetailedFailure](./ts-utils.detailedfailure.md) is a failure.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isFailure(): this is DetailedFailure<T, TD>;
```
**Returns:**

this is [DetailedFailure](./ts-utils.detailedfailure.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TD&gt;

`true`

## Remarks

Always true for [DetailedFailure](./ts-utils.detailedfailure.md) but can be used as type guard to discriminate [DetailedSuccess](./ts-utils.detailedsuccess.md) from [DetailedFailure](./ts-utils.detailedfailure.md) in a [DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->.
